import 'milligram/dist/milligram.min.css'; import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component{ state = { points: 4, ch: 0, pr: 0, ag: 0, st: 0 } render() { return (

Welcome to this app

This is a paragraph of text

You have 4 points in total. You have to allocate it to the following four attributes

You have {this.state.points} left

) } } export default App;
